CHANGES: Full localization. Turkish language has been added
Fixed error handling when installing a node.
Hot fix for Aztec Update ver.0.87.8.
View Aztec Logs - enhanced to display the last 500 lines with subsequent updates
Check Container and Latest Block - improved with better log reading and memory issue prevention
Improved dependency check and installation function for required software for the script
Added function Stop Aztec Node Containers
Added function Start Aztec Node Containers
Updated node launch command in CLI (validatorPrivateKeys)
Added function to check and delete old screen sessions
Updated the Aztec node installation script with Watchtower for multiple validators
Aztec node version check moved to separate option
Updated the validator committee inclusion check function (restored function operation)
Full support for the new network and testnet
New monitoring agent script for the node
New script for searching and verifying validators directly in Rollup and GSE contracts
Added new errors detected by the critical error control module
Updated script version control function. Now short descriptions of new versions and updates are shown

The function for searching for a validator in the queue and setting up queue monitoring with notifications in Telegram has been restored. Option 9 in main menu. Reinstallation of the monitoring agent is not required
FIX validator search function in the queue

FIX for Cloudflare captcha (Invalid JSON response). Restored the functionality of the queue search function and the launch of monitoring the validator's position in the queue with Telegram notifications. Use option 9

Last FIX for Cloudflare captcha (Invalid JSON response). Restored the functionality of the queue search function and the launch of monitoring the validator's position in the queue with Telegram notifications. Use option 9
Fix for curl_cffi installation. Some users encountered the following issue when installing curl_cffi: /usr/bin/python3: No module named pip or error: externally-managed-environment
Added new errors detected by the critical error control module
Fix for Option 9 (Search for validator and check status). Added batch loading of addresses from GSE contracts
Please update script, then delete old monitoring agent (use option 3) and Install new agent (use option 2)
New slot statistics notification system: stats are updated directly in the message as live slots
Update in the Aztec node installation script: resolved issue with P2P_IP on a server with a virtual machine
Update of the error file: Added an error case when the node does not receive BLOB data from BEACON RPC
